name.japanese: シャボンディ諸島 - GR46

description: Grove 46 of the Sabaody Archipelago, where pirates gathered after the Fake Straw Hat Crew's recruitment call. This grove became the battleground where Sentomaru exposed the impostors and where Luffy demonstrated his post-timeskip power by defeating PX-5.

keyEvents.title: Marines Attack Pirates at Grove 46
keyEvents.description: Marines arrive to arrest the assembled pirates who answered Fake Luffy's call, starting a battle.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the situation that exposes the Fake Straw Hat Crew and demonstrates the real crew's power.

keyEvents.title: Caribou's Numa Numa no Mi Debut
keyEvents.description: Caribou reveals his Logia Devil Fruit powers at Grove 46 by killing a Marine.
keyEvents.significance: First Logia-type Devil Fruit revealed after the timeskip.

keyEvents.title: Sentomaru Exposes Fake Luffy
keyEvents.description: Sentomaru reveals Fake Luffy's true identity as Demaro Black at Grove 46.
keyEvents.significance: Exposes the impostor and sets up the real Luffy's appearance.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Destroys PX-5
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses Haki-enhanced Gear Second to completely destroy Pacifista PX-5 in a single hit at Grove 46.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration of Luffy's post-timeskip combat abilities with Haki.

statusHistory.reason: Grove remains an active part of Sabaody Archipelago

name.japanese: シャボンディ諸島 - GR17

description: Grove 17 of the Sabaody Archipelago, where Rayleigh met with the Straw Hat Pirates on the Thousand Sunny after completing the ship coating. He provided Nami with instructions on how to operate a coated ship for their journey to Fish-Man Island.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Instructs Straw Hats at Grove 17
keyEvents.description: Rayleigh meets the Straw Hats on the Thousand Sunny at Grove 17 and teaches Nami how to operate the coated ship.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the crew's reunion point and shows the completion of ship coating.

statusHistory.reason: Grove remains an active part of Sabaody Archipelago
